results.text: But about that day or hour no one knows, not even the angels in heaven, nor the Son, but only the Father.
results.reason: Emphasizes the unknown timing of Jesus' return.
results.reflection: Our focus should be on being ready for His return rather than speculating about the timing.

results.text: Therefore keep watch, because you do not know on what day your Lord will come.
results.reason: Encourages readiness and vigilance for Jesus' return.
results.reflection: Living in constant awareness of His imminent return helps us stay faithful and prepared.

results.text: For you know very well that the day of the Lord will come like a thief in the night.
results.reason: Compares Jesus' return to a thief coming unexpectedly.
results.reflection: Just as we wouldn't want a thief to catch us off guard, let's be spiritually watchful for Christ's return.

results.text: He who testifies to these things says, 'Yes, I am coming soon.' Amen. Come, Lord Jesus.
results.reason: Affirms the promise of Jesus' imminent return.
results.reflection: Our response should be a heartfelt desire for His return, eagerly awaiting His coming.

results.text: But the day of the Lord will come like a thief. The heavens will disappear with a roar; the elements will be destroyed by fire, and the earth and everything done in it will be laid bare.
results.reason: Describes the dramatic events surrounding Jesus' return.
results.reflection: Let this reality motivate us to live holy and godly lives, knowing the temporary nature of this world.
